title: My phone alarm didn't go off this morning
body:
I had set it to 6am so I could get up and shower before work but it didn't go off 

My phone does this retarded shit where the screen does whatever it wants to, and to snooze the alarm you just tap the screen anywhere; so the alarm kept getting snoozed. 

Fortunately I woke up on my own at 6:10am and I looked at my phone and saw that it was snoozed. I was like "thank god I fucking woke up to check this thing." 

Unlucky
